title: Ghosts’ Rebecca Wisocky Talks Hetty’s ‘Resonant’ Power and Why She Loved Not Having a Special Ability
description: Warning: The following contains spoilers for Thursday’s Ghosts. Proceed at your own risk! After four seasons, Hetty finally has a power… at least for one day a year. On this week’s Ghosts, the Woodstone robber baroness discovered that she can be seen by livings, but only on St. Patrick’s Day. The other spirits reasoned that […]
author: Vlada Gelman

title: 9-1-1 Baddie Abigail Spencer Talks Facing Off Against Jennifer Love Hewitt: ‘I’m Glad It Went There’ (Plus, Have We Seen the Last of Amber?)
description: When Abigail Spencer showed up to film an episode of CBS’ Ghost Whisperer in 2007, series star Jennifer Love Hewitt already knew exactly who she was. It’s a moment Spencer tells TVLine she’ll never forget: “I walk on set and she’s like, ‘You’re the girl!’ I was like, ‘Oh my God, I’m getting fired.’ She […]
author: Andy Swift

title: 9-1-1 Season 8 Episode 10 Ignites Powerful Performances from Jennifer Love Hewitt & Abigail Spencer
description: Maddie finds herself in a horrifying situation after being kidnapped, while her family searches for her during 9-1-1 Season 8 Episode 10. The post 9-1-1 Season 8 Episode 10 Ignites Powerful Performances from Jennifer Love Hewitt & Abigail Spencer appeared first on TV Fanatic.

title: The Hunting Party Season 1 Episode 7 Spoilers: Can The Team Stop The Widower Before He Kills His Next Bride?
